sermons.title: (re-mix) The Revival Hymn
sermons.description: This is a very powerful audio message that will stir your soul for revival! Clips of following speakers included in this message: Ian Paisley, Leonard Ravenhill, Paris Reidhead, Duncan Campbell, A.W. Tozer, T. Austin Sparks.

sermons.title: Agony (compilation)
sermons.description: A Powerful prophetic word from Leonard Ravenhill. Oh may we pay heed to such a word, such a burden, such a clear message from God. "Sacrifice not sacrifice" Oh how we need to live the true Christian life in our day.

sermons.title: All To Jesus (compilation)
sermons.description: This compilation is comparable to the revival hymn compilation on this site! It features the voices of Leonard Ravenhill, A.W. Tozer, T. Austin Sparks, Alan Redpath, Paris Reidhead and Major Ian Thomas. The theme of this compilation is knowing God and true biblical salvation, listen to this compilation and share it with others.

sermons.title: All to Jesus (voice only)
sermons.description: This compilation is comparable to the revival hymn compilation on this site! It features the voices of Leonard Ravenhill, A.W. Tozer, T. Austin Sparks, Alan Redpath, Paris Reidhead and Major Ian Thomas. The theme of this compilation is knowing God and true biblical salvation, listen to this compilation and share it with others.

sermons.title: Be My Witnesses (compilation)
sermons.description: A mix of various clips from David Wilkerson and Carter Colon.

sermons.title: Can You Drink Of The Cup (compilation)
Discipleship Hyman (compilation)
sermons.description: Clips of messages by 1) The Demands of Discipleship by Dr. Stephen Olford 2) A Grain of Wheat by Major Ian Thomas 3) Deeper Spiritual Life by A. W. Tozer.

sermons.title: Do you have the real thing? (compilation)
Don't Preach About Hell! (compilation)
sermons.description: A powerful sharing about hell by Keith Green.

sermons.title: Don't give in to the Pressure (compilation)
Enslaved (compilation)
sermons.description: This is quite a powerful compilation that calls for death spiritually to be born again anew to God's purposes alone! powerful statement.

sermons.title: Everyone Needs To Do Nursery (compilation)
sermons.description: Some clips of Paris Reidhead with classic musical in the background.

sermons.title: Go All The Way Whit Jesus (compilation)
Go All The Way Whit Jesus (voice Only)
I want to be among those (compilation)
Instant Replay - The Worm Never Dies (compilation)
sermons.description: This is a very hard-hitting recording about the eternal quality of hell. The worm that dies not, never forgetting our chances to repent and do those first works. Very sobering.

sermons.title: Jesus Christ is Your Only Hope by Bob Jennings
More Worth Then Birds (compilation)
sermons.description: complimation of david wilkerson.

sermons.title: One thing you lack (compilation)
sermons.description: This one is radical, for some it may be too radical. It could haunt us, but in reality these are simply the words of Jesus that we have a tendency to skim over. Nothing watered down here. Play it if you want, might mess with you though.

sermons.title: Preach the Gospel (compilation)
sermons.description: This is an intresting compilation that has some clips of Carter Colon with an contemprary song in the background.

sermons.title: Repent for the Kingdom of Heaven is at hand (compilation)
sermons.description: Hear this powerful plea for mankind to repent and come to Jesus Christ the Lord for life. The message of the gospel has not changed in the last 2000 years. Will you hear the call today to repent and trust in God, to forsake your sins and embrace the cross. Heaven is soon and Hell is near.

sermons.title: Sinners in the hands of an angry God (compilation)
Somebody Prayed (compilation)
sermons.description: This is a moving compilation with the theme of prayer. The Speakers are Paris Reidhead and Ernest C. Reisinger. Truly God will do nothing unless through prayer, how often neglected this true work of God's Spirit is. May we hear the call of God to be interecessors for others.

sermons.title: Speak To Me (compilation)
sermons.description: This Compilation is small clips from David Wilkersons' message: A Famine In the Land.

sermons.title: Take Hold Of Eternal Life (compilation)
sermons.description: A powerful compilation of the speaker Zac Poonen speaking on true discipleship and eternal life. Oh to grasp the truths he is speaking of so that we do not waste more precious time in this sojourn that our days may be pleasing and fruitful to God.

sermons.title: Take my life (Compilation)
sermons.description:
A Wonderful mix of Contemporary Worship with a powerful salvation message (7 mins long) deliver by the following speaker:
[i]1. Billy Graham[/i]

sermons.title: The Damnation of Hell - Part 1 (voice only)
The Damnation of Hell - Part 2 (voice only)
The Lost Gospel by Paul Washer (compilation)
The Revival Hymn
sermons.description: This is a very powerful audio message that will stir your spirit for revival! Clips of following speakers included in this message: Ian Paisley, Leonard Ravenhill, Paris Reidhead, Duncan Campbell, A.W. Tozer, T. Austin Sparks. This is probably one of the most potent and powerful audio recordings on this entire site. You will be changed as you listen to this compilation.

sermons.title: To Live Is Christ, To Die Is Gain (compilation)
Today's Gospel (compilation)
sermons.description: Milton Green reads some excerpts from Walter Chatney's book called: Today's Gospel. He shows that modern day evangelism gives false assurance and preached God's love to people apart from His Holiness and character.

sermons.title: Truth And Error -  Part 3 - Come To The Light (compilation)
Truth And Error - Part 1 - Unity Of The Spirit (compilation)
Truth And Error - Part 2 - Truth And Error (compilation)
Uncompromising Holiness (compilation)
sermons.description: This is a powerful compilation from a sermon that brother Jesse Morrell preached called "Uncomprimising Holiness." The background classic music works wonderfully with it. This recording will deeply challange you, his voice and style reminds me of the dear late keith green.

sermons.title: Young Donald Mcphail Prays (compilation)
sermons.description: This is from a Duncan Campbell sermon, about this fire baptized 16 year old who prays in a meeting in the Hebrides revival, and the God moves in a mighty way.
